summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll for the improvement of Junction and Englewood Streets, from Colorado Street to 1st Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the former City of Georgetown, now a part of and in the City of Seattle, by sidewalking the same, under Ordinance No. 528 of the former City of Georgetown, now a part of the City of Seattle, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll and providing for the collection thereof.
